text: Excellent service and hot food! The best Pizza Hut that I have been to. That includes the ones in Orlando and Denver. Great job!

text: Order was improper but they fixed it quickly and the food was really good. Great crisp crust, fresh veggies on pizza and a nice little salad bar.

name: Russ Davis
text: Hot. Fresh and tasty. Thin crust wasnt crispy though. Soft. But over all great.

name: Ginny Reding
text: Clean. Good service. Variety of choices on the buffet. Good place to stop for a few, a family, or a bigger group.

name: John Calaway
text: They remodeled the inside...it looks great! Very friendly personnel..great salad bar and wonderful pizza assortment for lunch buffet. My favorite Pizza Hut!

name: Carla M
text: My view pizza hut is a great family place.  They are always so kind and friendly

text: Way better than pizza inn, fairly clean and quick service too. Pizza is never cold and the salad isn't soggy.

name: kenley holman
text: Service was not very good. we waited forever to be seated and was looked past and when we finally seated ourselves they didn‚Äôt come get our drinks or take our order. Garlic knots were served late and were cold.

name: Christopher Smith
text: This is your typical Pizza Hut buffet, but with really good service. The staff kept fresh pizzas coming regularly. The salad bar was also good. The most important part was that the staff kept the areas clean. Even though there was only one girl working as waitress/counter help, she hustled and kept up with drink refills with no problem.

text: Okay, I like Pizza Hut pizza.  It is one of my favorites, but I don't know what happened here.  The service is great, but there is just something off about this pizza.  I can't put my finger on it, but the crust is different somehow.  Some ‚Ä¶More

text: Pizza was cold and they never refilled the pasta an. Plus 4 different people asked about our drinks. So that was that many chances to get it right and still got it wrong.

name: Lottie B
text: Wasn't bad for a quick pick up dinner. Ordered three pizzas, which were fine. Ordered honey bbq boneless wings and they were plain with zero sauce. Basically boneless nuggets. Other than the wing mishap, it was good.

text: The pizza was beyond good. All pizza huts should serve pizzas like the one we had at this one.

name: Debbie
text: This is a good place to eat. It is very very clean and the lunch buffet is cheaper than the pizza inn almost next door to it. My only complaint is the ranch dressing tastes like it came out of a cheap bottle from Walmart. It is terrible.
